876772, 881772, 886772, 891772, 896772, 901772, 906772, 911772};

int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
              int n,k;
              
              scanf("%d%d",&n,&k);
              if(k>1044) printf("0\n");
              else printf("%d\n",LIS[k]<=n);
    }
    return 0;
}
